data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Learning another language can bring many benefits. Firstly, delving into another language can make people more mentally alert because people are also paying attention to body language cues. Secondly, being bilingual or multilingual makes people better multi-taskers. Using cognitive muscles to navigate multiple languages can make you more adept at juggling tasks in other ways. Moreover, knowing other languages encourages cultural appreciation. Learning a new language could contribute to greater tolerance because of the exposure to a variety of cultures. Some studies show there is a correlation between being bilingual and having a more positive outlook. Ultimately, learning another language can help bring advantages to people's lives.
data.referenceText: What are the benefits of learning another language?
data.referenceTranslate: 学习另一种语言的好处是什么?
